name: e2e-tests
description: SkillTree Dashboard and Client Display End to End Tests
author: SkillTree Team

scripts.licenseCheck: npm run licenseHeaderCheck && npm run licenseDepCheck
scripts.cy:open:dev:postgres: TZ=UTC cypress open --config baseUrl=http://localhost:8082 --env db=postgres --env failOnSnapshotDiff=false
scripts.cy:open:dev:oauth: TZ=UTC cypress open --config baseUrl=http://localhost:8082 --env oauthMode=true --env failOnSnapshotDiff=false
scripts.cy:run: TZ=UTC npm run licenseCheck && cypress run
scripts.cy:run:postgres: TZ=UTC npm run licenseCheck && cypress run --env db=postgres
scripts.cy:run:oauth: TZ=UTC npm run licenseCheck && cypress run --env oauthMode=true
scripts.cy:run:accessibility: TZ=UTC npm run licenseCheck && cypress run --config experimentalRunEvents=true --browser chrome --headless --spec "cypress/integration/accessibility*.js,cypress/integration/client-display/client-display_accessibility.js"
scripts.cy:run:dev:accessibility: TZ=UTC cypress run --browser chrome --headless --config baseUrl=http://localhost:8082 --spec cypress/integration/accessibility*.js
scripts.backend:resetDb:postgres: export PGPASSWORD=skillsPassword && psql -U postgres -h localhost -d skills -f ./cypress/db/reset.sql
scripts.backend:clearDb:postgres: export PGPASSWORD=skillsPassword && psql -U postgres -h localhost -d skills -f ./cypress/db/clear.sql
scripts.backend:dropAllDBTables:postgres: export PGPASSWORD=skillsPassword && psql -U postgres -h localhost -d skills -f ./cypress/db/dropTables.sql
scripts.client-display:serve: cd ../client-display && npm prune && npm install && npm run serve
scripts.cyServices:start:skills-service: npm run backend:start:ci && npm run backend:waitToStart
scripts.cyServices:start:skills-service:postgres: npm run fake-smtp:start:ci &&  npm run backend:start:postgresql:ci && npm run backend:waitToStart
scripts.cyServices:start:skills-service:redis: npm run fake-smtp:start:ci &&  npm run backend:start:redis:ci && npm run backend:waitToStart
scripts.cyServices:start:skills-service:oauth: npm run fake-smtp:start:ci &&  npm run backend:start:oauth:ci && npm run backend:waitToStart
scripts.cyServices:start:skills-service:rabbitmq: npm run fake-smtp:start:ci &&  npm run backend:start:rabbitmq:ci && npm run backend:waitToStart
scripts.cyServices:start:client-display: npm run client-display:serve:ci && npm run client-display:waitToStart
scripts.cyServices:start:client-display:oauth: npm run client-display:serve:ci:oauth && npm run client-display:waitToStart
scripts.cyServices:start: npm run cyServices:start:skills-service && npm run fake-smtp:start:ci && npm run cyServices:start:client-display
scripts.cyServices:kill:skills-service: for procid in $(ps -aux | grep "serverConfigs/.*properties" | grep "jar$" | awk '{print $2}'); do echo "killing skills-service ${procid}"; kill -9 $procid; done
scripts.cyServices:kill:client-display: for procid in $(ps -aux | grep "client-display" | grep "serve" | grep -v "grep" | awk '{print $2}'); do echo "killing skills-display ${procid}"; kill -9 $procid; done
scripts.cyServices:kill:client-display:1: for procid in $(ps -aux | grep "client-display" | grep "vue-cli-service serve" | grep -v "grep" | awk '{print $2}'); do echo "killing skills-display  ${procid}"; kill -9 $procid; done
scripts.cyServices:kill: npm run cyServices:kill:skills-service && npm run cyServices:kill:client-display && npm run cyServices:kill:client-display:1 && npm run fake-smtp:stop
